com.airomo.sdk.ui.fragment

Class ExploreGridFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.airomo.sdk.ui.fragment.AiromoSDKConnectedFragment
        • com.airomo.sdk.ui.fragment.ExploreGridFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, com.airomo.sdk.ui.adapter.IPageLoadController, com.airomo.sdk.ui.data.IACDataContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppExploreGridFragment

    public abstract class ExploreGridFragment
extends com.airomo.sdk.ui.fragment.AiromoSDKConnectedFragment
implements com.airomo.sdk.ui.adapter.IPageLoadController, com.airomo.sdk.ui.data.IACDataContainer
    Base fragment for explore grid view. Used to display set of tiles based on JSON data returned by API in scrollable grid.
    Author:
    Dennis Gubsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ExploreGridFragment.ExploreGridTileType
      Tile view display mode.
      static interface  ExploreGridFragment.OnContentChangedListener
      Listener interface to monitor total number of items in explore view
      static interface  ExploreGridFragment.OnItemSelectedListener
      Public callback interface to inform container when an item in explorer grid was selected by user.

      • FILTER

        public static final java.lang.String FILTER
        Use to pass filter bundle as fragment argument

      • CLEAR_TOP

        public static final java.lang.String CLEAR_TOP
        Pass true as fragment argument to limit number of tiles and keep it while scrolling content by removing tiles from the top.

      • SORT_ORDER

        public static final java.lang.String SORT_ORDER
        Use to pass sort order as fragment argument. Use com.airomo.sdk.ui.sort.AppExploreSortOrder.(value).ordinal()

      • TILE_TYPE

        public static final java.lang.String TILE_TYPE
        Use to pass tile display mode as fragment argument. Use ExploreGridTileType.ordinal() as value

    • Method Detail

      • makeArguments

        public static android.os.Bundle makeArguments(java.lang.String clientId,
                              java.lang.String apiKey,
                              ExploreGridFragment.ExploreGridTileType tileType,
                              android.os.Bundle filterBundle,
                              boolean clearTop)
        Make arguments bundle for explore view fragment.
        Parameters:
        clientId - developer client ID
        apiKey - developer API KEY
        tileType - tile display type
        filterBundle - filter bundle to pass to API
        clearTop - true as fragment argument to limit number of tiles and keep it while scrolling content by removing tiles from the top
        Returns:
        arguments bundle
